item.title: Seamless VOIP
item.description:
Seamless VOIP: Revolutionizing Business Communication

Convert your on-premise PBX (VOIP/Softswitch) to cloud-based PBX at low cost, and revolutionize your business, with our solution you can:

item.title: Operator Panel
item.description:
Effortless Operator Panel: Elevate Your VoIP Business

Experience a powerful, intuitive, and secure operator panel that simplifies how you manage and monitor VoIP services — all at no cost as part of our startup ecosystem.

item.title: Quick start
item.description: Welcome to VoIPStack — a modern, secure, and flexible platform to monitor, manage, and scale your VoIP infrastructure. This guide walks you through the essential steps to start using our system effectively.

item.title: (Panel) hangup active call
item.description: The VoipSTACK panel is highly customizable and, by default, does not include any predefined actions. Let’s walk through how to create an action to hang up a call.

item.title: (Panel) transfer active call
item.description: The VoipSTACK panel is highly customizable and, by default, does not include any predefined actions. Let’s walk through how to create an action to transfer a call.

item.title: Privacy
item.description:
Tue Jun 17 / 2025

Cardonas OÜ

Contact: info@voipstack.io

1. Introduction

At Cardonas OÜ, we are committed to protecting your privacy and handling your data responsibly. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your personal information when you use our services, websites, applications, and APIs.
